content: colonnade hat finished measurements fits adult up to 21/22 head materials approximately 2 ¾ to 3 ounces worsted weight yarn crochet hook size i hook or size needed to achieve gauge gauge 3 half_double_crochet = roughly 1 inch but not critical abbreviations single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet =double_crochet fpdc = front post double_crochet note always count initial chains as half_double_crochet stitch do not turn at the end of any rounds round 1 chain 3 work 9 half_double_crochet in first chain join in first stitch 10 stitches round 2 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in each stitch join in first stitch 20 stitches round 3 chain 2 1 half_double_crochet in first stitch 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat around join in first stitch 30 stitches round 4 chain 2 1 half_double_crochet in first stitch & second stitch 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat around join in first stitch 40 stitches round 5 chain 2 1 half_double_crochet in first second & third stitches 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat around join in first stitch 50 stitches round 6 chain 2 1 half_double_crochet in first second third & fourth stitches 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat around join in first stitch 60 stitches round 7 chain 2 work 1 double_crochet each stitch around join round 8 chain 2 1 fpdc in next st 1 double_crochet in next repeat around join in first stitch rounds 9 15 repeat round 8 round 16 chain 2 half_double_crochet in back loop only of each stitch around join in first stitch round 17 chain 1 work single_crochet in each stitch around join in first stitch cut yarn weave any yarn ends in to finish
